软件包 com.lqk.framework.verification.annotation

枚举摘要
NumberRule.NumberType  
 

注释类型摘要
Checked Annotation works with Views that implement the Checkable interface.
ConfirmPassword Used along with the Password annotation.
Email Enforces email validation on the annotated View.
IpAddress Allows only valid IP Addresses on the annotated View.
NumberRule Number rule annotation.
Password Used to annotate a password field.
Regex Enables to specify a regular expression for the EditText.
Required When used, the field cannot be empty.
TextRule Specifies constraints such as min length, max length and trim on textual data contained in Views.
 

概述   软件包  类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助
